description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nNot Quite A Dud:
When an enemy's {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} detonates at the start of their turn, there is a 50% chance the {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuff won't be removed from the creature. This trait does not stack.
name: Decoy Poison
